file.content:
openapi: 3.0.2
info:
  title: All-in-one schema
  version: 0.1.0
  description: This is a Dummy api, containing a schema with as much OpenAPI schema possibilities as defined in the spec.

components:
  schemas:
    allInOne:
      $ref: 'all-in-one.yaml#/components/schemas/allInOne'
    



paths:
  /dummy:
    get:
      responses:
        200:
          content:
            "application/json":
              schema:
                $ref: "#/components/schemas/allInOne"
